entry.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 23, 20:00 - 21:00 UTC

Aug 18, 14:44 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/08/2023 20:00 UTC
End time : 23/08/2023 21:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, at one point, a short downtime of no more than 10 minutes will be experienced. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times. Please do not hesitate to contact us via our support channels with any questions or concerns.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on customers' projects

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Web Cloud] - VoIP Billing
entry.content:
Aug 21, 09:55 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 01/08/2023 00:00 UTC
End Time : 12/08/2023 10:33 UTC
Service impact : Customers might have received blank invoices for their consumption for July 2023.
Root cause : Software issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
Customers who are currently impacted can contact our customer support in order to resolve their specific issue.

Aug 16, 09:03 UTC
Update - The invoices of the packs are operational. All the billing accounts with an invoice of the 02/08/2023 are those with the outplan

Aug 10, 14:19 UTC
Update - The refunds have been processed. The next invoice should be arriving shortly.
The next update should be coming soon.

Aug 9, 15:16 UTC
Update - The Fiber and XDSL packs are being processed, an update should be provided soon.

Aug 8, 09:16 UTC
Update - The second part is completed.
The outplan invoice has been sent. The CDRs are available in the statement dated 02/08. Excluding Fiber and XDSL packs.

Aug 7, 09:01 UTC
Update - The second part is in progress . The outplan invoice and statements will arrive soon.

Aug 4, 13:37 UTC
Update - As previously indicated, the re-crediting of affected customers for the month of June is underway.
The second phase, which concerns customers who have not been billed for their out-of-pocket expenses for July, will begin on Monday.

Aug 3, 10:16 UTC
Monitoring - Our team has put a solution in place, the billing service is operational and a regularisation will be carried out in 2 phases.
The first phase will involve re-crediting affected customers for the month of June. This adjustment will begin later today.
The second phase will concern customers who have not been billed for their out-of-pocket expenses for July.
This will be scheduled for tomorrow, and may take the whole weekend to process.
Customers concerned by these 2 phases will be notified by email.

Aug 1, 15:14 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 1, 10:18 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 01/08/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers may receive blank invoices for their consumption for July 2023.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
